DOC.brief_summary: Using local analgesia in laparoscopic surgery in order to reduce pain and to reduce the use of narcotic drugs.
DOC.brief_title: The Efficacy of Surgical Site Treatment With Ropivacaine in Laparoscopic Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: At the end of laparoscopic surgery the investigators will spray ropivacaine in the surgical site; and later the investigators will monitor pain intensity and use of analgesic drugs
DOC.criteria: Laparoscopic bariatric surgery Laparoscopic inguinal hernia surgery Cardiac arrythmias Active ischemic heart disease pregnancy
